translations: n．无产阶级（proletariat的复数形式）：指社会中没有财产、依靠出卖劳动力为生的工人阶级。
· The proles were the backbone of the revolution.
无产阶级是革命的中坚力量。

sentences.sentence: The future belonged to the proles.
If there was hope, it lay in the proles!
sentences.translation: 如果有希望，希望在无产者中间！

sentences.sentence: The Party claimed, of course, to have liberated the proles from bondage.
sentences.translation: 当然啦，按党的说法，它在把无产者从枷锁当中解放出来。
